import get from'lodash/get';/**
 * Detect if the user is a publisher from the user context.
 *
 * @param {object} userContext The user context
 */export var isPublisher=function isPublisher(userContext){var portalAdmin=!!get(userContext,'userDetails.portalAdmin',null);var apiOwner=!!get(userContext,'userDetails.apiOwner',null);var orgPublisher=!!get(userContext,'userDetails.orgPublisher',null);return portalAdmin||apiOwner||orgPublisher;};
